main.question: What is World Wi-Fi?
main.answer: World Wi-Fi is a global decentralized free network. The users of the platform are ordinary people, router owners and advertisers. The users enjoy free internet, router owners are paid by advertisers for the ads viewed by the users; advertisers receive an effective tool for targeting of advertising and analytics of advertising campaign effectiveness.

main.question: When is the Token Sale?
main.answer: Token Sale Start/End Date: 18 MARCH / 18 APRIL 2018

main.question: What are you going to do with undistributed tokens?
main.answer: All undistributed tokens will be burnt on the day after the end of Token Sale.

main.question: How can I pay for WeTokens?
I live outside the EU, can I participate in Token Sale?
I am under 18, can I participate in Token Sale?
main.answer: No, only persons over 18 years old may participate in Token Sale.

main.question: What happens in case the company will not able to collect the minimum required amount?
main.answer: In the case the company is not able to collect the minimum required amount, all the fund raised will be returned to the investors.

general.question: What is World Wi-Fi?
general.answer: World Wi-Fi is a global decentralized free network. The participants of the platform include ordinary users, router owners and advertisers. The users enjoy free internet, router owners are paid by advertisers for the ads viewed by the users; advertisers receive an effective tool for targeting of advertising and analytics of advertising campaign effectiveness.

general.question: Why do not you use only classical methods of attracting investments?
general.answer: Good question. First, attracting different private investors may lead to business disagreements. We are professionals in our field and we know how to make a successfull business. Second, attracting money through the Token Sale does not give investors a share in business, it is a financial instrument and after fulfilling obligations the business itself will remain in the hands of the team.

general.question: In what jurisdiction Token Sale is conducted?
What is the current technical stage in the project development? Were there any tests conducted? Are there any results of those available? Do you have a MVP available for demonstration?
general.answer: We have two working  businesses for selling Wi-Fi advertising and hotspots. The model is tested in b2b marketing and has been runing for 2 years. The total number of connected access points is trending at 14,000 in 80 cities. In March a blockchain based model will be launched.

general.question: What legal base and expertise the project is premised on?
general.answer: User identification is conducted in compliance with the relevant legislation

general.question: On which exchanges are your tokens traded?
general.answer: Our tokens will be available on exchanges upon the Token Sale completion.

general.question: Where will the routers be manufactured (purchased) and what will be a router price?
general.answer: No need to buy a new router for World Wi-Fi. Most residential routers are compatible with our software.

Token Sale.question: When is the PRESALE?
Token Sale.answer: PRESALE is on from 28 November to 16 March. More info at https://worldwifi.io

Token Sale.answer: Token Sale Start/End Date: 18 MARCH / 18 APRIL 2018

Token Sale.answer:
Soft cap â€“ 3,500,000 US dollars
Hard cap â€“ 25,000,000 US dollars

Token Sale.question: What will be the volume/quantity of tokens issued during the private sale?
Token Sale.answer: The volume of token will be fixed 60,000,000 WeToken

Token Sale.question: Is the number of tokens limited?
On which platform will be the token sale based on?
Token Sale.answer: The token sale will be based on the Etherium platform

Token Sale.question: Are there any restrictions for participation in ICO?
Token Sale.answer: By purchasing a token in the course of ICO, or in any other way you agree that you are not a citizen of the United States, Singapore, Canada, or any other country where tokens are equated to securities. Also, you must know whether you are violating the law of your country.

Token Sale.question: How much tokens will be available for purchase?
Token Sale.answer: During PRESALE and ICO, 258,000,000 WT will be available for purchase.

Token Sale.question: Of particularly concern is the issue of the structure of the invested funds: you allocate 5% for contingencies which is almost $1,3 â€“ what do those include, provided that as many as 20% go to the legal and technical component?
Token Sale.answer: We have made a consolidated summary of estimates for the project promotion. A 5% adjustment might be incorporated for pricing fluctuation which is an appropriate standard of practice.

Token Sale.question: O3% is allocated for advisers. This is a considerable amount ($774 when calculated in numbers). As many as 25 to 30 advisers might be engaged for the above amount. Couldyouprovidemoredetails about those?
Token Sale.answer: At the current stage we have been negotiating with top leaders of the cryptocurrency community. 3% account for engaging top advisers. At an early stage of the campaign, not all advisors have entered into agreements which is par for the course.

Token Sale.question: Where a smart contract is available?

how to buy.question: How to find the cost of one token relative to Etherium or Bitcoin?
how to buy.answer: The cost is calculated automatically at the time of confirmation of the transaction by the network based on the average value of the price on the exchanges.

how to buy.question: What is the cost of one token?
how to buy.answer: 1 WeToken = 10 advertising impressions in World Wi-Fi = $0.1 - at Pre-Sale stage.

how to buy.question: How can I invest?
how to buy.answer: There are detailed instructions on the main page of the site, if necessary our support in the Telegram chat can help you. The easiest way is to transfer the etherium to a smart contract from your personal wallet with the erc223 standard. The tokens return to your wallet automatically after confirmation of network.

how to buy.question: I want to make payment in dollars, how to do it?
how to buy.answer: For beginners in the field of crypto currencies, there is a detailed instruction on the initial page. For a large investment (from $50,000), the organizers are ready for a personal meeting.

how to buy.question: On the main page of the site and in my personal account there are various addresses of directions to the etherium, where to pay?
how to buy.answer: If you pay from a personal wallet, with the erc223 standard, you can pay directly to the address of the smart contract (address on the main page), the tokens return in automatic mode. If the exchange is with a stock exchange, exchanger, etc., then it is necessary to use a personal cabinet, tokens will be credited in it.

how to buy.question: Whatâ€™s the minimum of investment during token sale?
how to buy.answer: The minimal possible purchase is 1 WeToken

how to buy.question: What is the gas?
how to buy.answer: The gas is a unit of measurement in which the prices for calculations on the Etherium are measured. The more complex calculation is, the more it is rewarded with gas. This works as follows: the originator of a smart contract sets the price in gases. Miners, on whose computers the calculations are performed, decide whether to perform these calculations or not. If the price is too high, the calculations, and the contract, will never be executed.

about token.question: The ERC223 standard of the token, what is it?
about token.answer: This is the most modern standard for a token based on the Etherium network. It will support the transparency of transactions with investors. Important: your etherium wallet must support this standard to obtain tokens.

about token.question: On which exchanges will the tokens be traded?
about token.answer: This information will be published in July 2018, at this stage negotiations are in progress.

about token.question: How will the tokens be redeemed?
about token.answer: We are developing a transparent algorithm for open redemption. Previously, this will be the redemption of tokens from exchanges, and we also consider connecting the capabilities of our site for this purpose.

security.question: How do I know my tokens are secure?
security.answer: Your tokens will be securely stored in your wallet. We use the encryption with two factor authentification.

other.question: How is your project different from Hot Wi-Fi?
other.answer: The subscription model is used in Radius, and World Wi-Fi is not based on a subscription model

other.question: Who has already invested into your project?
other.answer: The project initiators have invested personal funds. In addition, we have collected funds from private investors and foundations

other.question: How are you going to partner with to develop globally?
other.answer: World Wi-Fi is a technological platform to be developed though engaging new participants via marketing and PR campaigns in many regions (see details in Financial Model), as well as by engaging system administrators, router installation servicemen, etc. in our referral program. Besides, it is our intention to develop the business throughout public Wi-Fi networks around the world which is an already existing business model (our existing projects Adrenta and Radius Wi-Fi are based on that system).
